argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cnring | |- CCfld e. Ring |
| 2 |  | #P_ringgrp | |- ( CCfld e. Ring -> CCfld e. Grp ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_ax-mp | |- CCfld e. Grp |
| 4 |  | #P_cnfldms | |- CCfld e. MetSp |
| 5 |  | #P_ssid | |- ( abs o. - ) C_ ( abs o. - ) |
| 6 |  | #P_cnfldnm | |- abs = ( norm ` CCfld ) |
| 7 |  | #P_cnfldsub | |- - = ( -g ` CCfld ) |
| 8 |  | #P_cnfldds | |- ( abs o. - ) = ( dist ` CCfld ) |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_isngp | |- ( CCfld e. NrmGrp <-> ( CCfld e. Grp /\ CCfld e. MetSp /\ ( abs o. - ) C_ ( abs o. - ) ) ) |
| 10 | 3, 4, 5, 9 | #P_mpbir3an | |- CCfld e. NrmGrp |
